languages.text: "Боюсь, Райкад Минорис потерян. Ситуация становится хуже с каждой минутой, и мы должны покинуть эту систему как можно скорее".
"I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, Райкад Минорис потерян. Ситуация становится хуже с каждой минутой, и мы должны покинуть эту систему как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."
"I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."
"I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."
"I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."

languages.text: “小莱卡德恐怕已经彻底沦陷了。这里的局势每分每秒都在恶化，我们必须尽快离开这个星系。”
languages.original_text: "I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: “小莱卡德恐怕已经彻底沦陷了。这里的局势每分每秒都在恶化，我们必须尽快离开这个星系。”

languages.text: 「ライカド・ミノリスが失われのではないかと危惧しています。状況は刻一刻と悪化しています。一刻も早くこの星系を離れなければ」
languages.original_text: "I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「ライカド・ミノリスが失われたことを危惧します。状況は刻一刻と悪化しています。一刻も早くこの星系を離れなければ」
「ライカド・ミノリスが失われのではないかと危惧しています。状況は刻一刻と悪化しています。一刻も早くこの星系を離れなければ」

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Rykad Minoris ist verloren. Die Lage wird minütlich schlimmer – wir müssen das System so bald wie möglich verlassen."
languages.original_text: "I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Rykad Minoris ist verloren. Die Lage wird minütlich schlimmer – wir müssen das System so bald wie möglich verlassen."

languages.text: « Je crains que Rykad Minoris ne soit perdue. La situation se détériore rapidement, nous devons quitter ce système le plus vite possible. »
languages.original_text: "I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que Rykad Minoris ne soit perdue. La situation se détériore rapidement, nous devons quitter ce système le plus vite possible. »

languages.text: «Me temo que Rykad Minoris está perdido. La situación no deja de empeorar a cada momento; será mejor abandonar este sistema cuanto antes».
languages.original_text: "I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que Rykad Minoris está perdido. La situación no deja de empeorar a cada momento; será mejor abandonar este sistema cuanto antes».

languages.text: "Korkarım Rykad Minoris artık kurtarılamaz. Durum her geçen dakika daha da kötüleşiyor. Bu sistemi bir an önce terk etmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "I fear that Rykad Minoris is lost. The situation is deteriorating by the minute — we must leave this system as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Korkarım Rykad Minoris artık kurtarılamaz. Durum her geçen dakika daha da kötüleşiyor, bu sistemi bir an önce terk etmeliyiz."
